RTCIceCandidatePort.summary:
The interface's read-only port property contains the port
number on the device at the address given by at which the candidate's peer can be reached.

remarks.para:
The port field's value is set from the candidateInfo options object passed to the constructor.
You can't specify the value of port directly in the options object, but its value is automatically extracted from the object's candidate a-line, if it's formatted properly.

RTCIceCandidatePort.value:
A 16-bit number indicating the port number on the device at the address indicated by at which the candidate's peer can be reached.port is initialized to null if it is not specified in the
candidate, or if the candidate string can't be parsed properly.
NOTENote: If port is null, passing the candidate to
will fail, throwing an OperationError exception.
This applies only if the candidate implements port.
